== Main inclusion report for launchpad-integration ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' `http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/l/launchpad-integration/`, compiled on all arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' library and python tools for the `LaunchpadIntegration` specification.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* No suid or sgid bit set.
* Binaries to /usr/bin.

4. ''QA:''
* no bug.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `CDBS` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian package policy met.

=== Reviewers ===

MartinPitt: reviewed code and packaging, approved.
